subject: [Agents] Baseline and structure lock for CP dashboard IA v1
description:
Intent:
- Lock the IA baseline and sequencing for the new CP cockpit.
- Ensure a decision-complete path before implementation.

Assumptions:
- Ops cockpit, config-first ownership, 4 CP subnav tabs.

Design + invariants:
- No public API contract changes in this cycle.
- Secrets remain out of CP editable fields.

Diff plan:
- .plans/cp-dashboard-ia-v1-2026-02-26.md
- .tasks/agents-cp-dashboard-ia-v1/*.json

Verification:
- Dependency graph + depends_on chain is complete and acyclic.
